name: 謝佳玲
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
實驗研究
量調查研究或質調查研究
個案研究
回溯研究
文化比較研究
理論闡述研究
schedule:
Week 1-6: Literature review
Week 7-10: Data collection
Week 11-14: Pilot study
Week 15-18: Data analysis
materials:
1. Barnes, Susan B. 2003. Computer-Mediated Communication: Human to Human Communication across the Internet. Boston: Peason Education.
2. Blum-Kulka, Shoshana, Juliane House and Gabriele Kasper (eds.). 1989. Cross-Cultural Pragmatics: Requests and Apologies. Norwood, NJ: Ablex.
3. Fukushima, Saeko. 2000. Requests and Culture: Politeness in British English and Japanese. New York: Peter Lang.
4. Herring, Susan C. (ed.). 1996. Computer-Mediated Communication: Linguistic, Social, and Cross-Cultural Perspectives. Amsterdam; Philadelphia: John Benjamins.
5. Hong, Wei. 1998. Request Patterns in Chinese and German: A Cross-cultural Study. Munchen: LINCOM EUROPA.
6. Trosborg, Anna. 1995. Interlanguage Pragmatics: Requests, Complaints and Apologies. Berlin; New York: Mouton de Gruyter.
